error.cmdnf: Command not found in AVR config file.
error.dev_mis_del: Slot selected with no device attached on deletion.
error.full_dev_ar: No free slot for new device: device array overflow.
error.devnotavail: Device is curently not available. i.e not connected to AVR.
error.devnotused: Slot does not have a valid device.
error.devnotsel: Select device before selecting input source.

surround.game: switched to surround mode game console
surround.direct: switched to surround mode surround direct
